description: This file defines the interface IAppManager within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, including nested INotification interface. It includes method signatures for managing applications, such as launching, loading, closing, and retrieving app properties, along with notification callbacks for app lifecycle events.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for managing applications within the WPEFramework, providing methods for app lifecycle and property management, and registration of notifications.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for app lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification listener for app lifecycle events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification listener.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application with a specified intent and launch arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application with specified intent and arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an application for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a specified application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a specified application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears data for a specified application.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specified application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for an application based on key.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Gets a property value of an application.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property value for an application.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Gets the maximum flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
